alert.note: Alert for Alger; Delta; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:18AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Luce, northeastern Delta, Schoolcraft and Alger Counties through 815 AM EDT... At 717 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles north of Grand Island to 6 miles southeast of Gladstone. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manistique, Munising, Grand Island, Grand Marais, Miners Castle, Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Chapel Lake, Nahma, Germfask, Garden, Seney, M-94 between Steuben and Manistique, Shingleton, Grand Sable Dunes, Garden Corners, Blaney Park, Steuben, M-28 between Shingleton and Seney, Isabella and Fayette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Delta; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
